statements: SELECT * FROM solo_travel_safety_tips;
SELECT tip_id, tip_description FROM solo_travel_safety_tips;
SELECT tip_description, precautions FROM solo_travel_safety_tips WHERE tip_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_safety_tips WHERE tip_description LIKE '%emergency%';
SELECT tip_id, precautions FROM solo_travel_safety_tips ORDER BY tip_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_safety_tips WHERE tip_id = 1;
SELECT tip_description, precautions FROM solo_travel_safety_tips WHERE tip_id = 3;
SELECT tip_id, tip_description, precautions FROM solo_travel_safety_tips WHERE tip_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_safety_tips WHERE tip_id IN (2, 4, 5) ORDER BY tip_id DESC;
SELECT tip_id, tip_description FROM solo_travel_safety_tips WHERE precautions IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tip_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM travel_safety_tips;
SELECT tip_description, safety_level FROM travel_safety_tips WHERE safety_level > 3;
SELECT precaution_description FROM travel_precautions WHERE precaution_location = 'Airport';

SELECT precaution_id, precaution_description, precaution_location FROM travel_precautions ORDER BY precaution_location DESC;

SELECT precaution_description, precaution_location FROM travel_precautions ORDER BY precaution_location DESC;

SELECT tip_title, tip_description FROM solo_travel_safety_tips UNION SELECT precaution_title, precaution_details FROM travel_precautions;

SELECT tip_id, tip_description FROM travel_safety_tips ORDER BY tip_id DESC;

SELECT destination, review_title, rating FROM TravelReviews WHERE destination = 'Paris' ORDER BY rating DESC, id ASC;
